meanings.sent1: The feelings of the shy girl remained unexpressed.
meanings.sent2: Her unexpressed thoughts were hidden behind a smile.
meanings.sent3: The unexpressed surprise on his face was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The unexpressed tension in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The unexpressed emotions bubbled beneath the surface.

meanings.sent1: The unexpressed secrets of the old house intrigued the children.
meanings.sent2: His unexpressed intentions left everyone guessing.
meanings.sent3: The unexpressed truth finally came to light.
meanings.sent4: The unexpressed mysteries of the universe fascinated scientists.
meanings.sent5: The unexpressed plans slowly unraveled before our eyes.
